title: True or False (1 point each)
instructions: Select True or False for each statement.

questions.question: You can run git locally without connecting to a server. You only need to connect to a server when you want to push your changes.
A transform tells you the color, position, and scale of an object.
Ports are profitable because of their lower development costs.
Developers always retain the rights to their created intellectual property.
Digital games are generally more profitable than physical games.
